name: One Night with Spong 4: By Day's End (CANCELLED)
name_original: One Night with Spong 4: By Day's End (CANCELLED)
description:
IF YOU'RE SEEING THIS, THIS GAME HAS BEEN CANCELLED. THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING THE ONwS SERIES!

3 months after the events of ONwS 3, Spong has taken one last approach at beating you...

He has decided to put you through various scenarios, trying to mess with you and then killing you once you're broken enough. He got everyone from all of your adventures to come and fight you, plus some new characters too! Luckily, some of them, including Nathaniel, want to help you!

This time, instead of one night, you have to last one week...

Can you survive One Week with Spong?

CHECK OU THE REST OF THE SERIES! https://itch.io/c/2074959/one-night-with-spong-full-series

(This game has been cancelled, this is a 2 night beta of the game that I'm releasing)
